# Initialize dashboardr page configuration (CSS/JS for charts)
dashboardr:::.page_config()

```{r setup}
#| echo: false
#| warning: false
#| message: false
#| error: false
#| results: 'hide'

# Load dashboardr (includes dplyr, highcharter as dependencies)
library(dashboardr)

# Global chunk options
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  error = FALSE,
  fig.width = 12,
  fig.height = 8,
  dpi = 300
)

# Load data
data <- readRDS('dataset_2997obs.rds')

# Data summary
cat('Dataset loaded:', nrow(data), 'rows,', ncol(data), 'columns\n')

```


```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, results='asis'}
# Use dashboardr's loading overlay function
dashboardr::create_loading_overlay("Almost ready...", 2000, theme = "dark")
```


## Dark Overlay Theme



This page uses the **dark** overlay theme - ideal for dark-themed dashboards.

Reload the page to see the overlay again.

## Education Levels

result
